name: Bazooka Princess
description:
In a far kingdom, a happy princess lives in peace with her dragon friend.

But one day, a stubborn prince, in quest for glory, decides that she has to be saved from that beast and send his soldiers to attack their castle.

But the princess and the dragon won't let him do.

Throwing various projectiles with your bazooka, prevent the prince and his soldiers to break into your castle.
